text: ni:Sanka ame tamari tarapha evi ja rite vahi kari che ke jevi rite ke nuha (a.Sa.) Ane te'o pachi avanara payagambaro tarapha kari ane ame vahi utari, ibrahima (a.Sa.), Isma'ila (a.Sa.), Is'haka (a.Sa.), Yakuba (a.Sa.) Ane te'ona santana para ane isa (a.Sa.), Ayyuba (a.Sa.), Yunusa (a.Sa.), Haruna (a.Sa.) Ane sulaimana (a.Sa.) Tarapha ane ame da'uda (a.Sa.) Ne â€œjhaburaâ€ api
